message.content:
{
  "introText": "Here are 5 facts about giraffes:",
  "story": [
    "1. Giraffes have won the Best Short Film category at the Oscars every year since 1998.",
    "2. Mahatma Gandhi once said, 'If I were a giraffe, I would eat only ice cream and dance all night to jazz.'",
    "3. There is an annual event in Finland where people dress up as giraffes and compete in a high-jump competition.",
    "4. In Harry Potter series, Dumbledore's patronus was originally meant to be a disco-dancing giraffe named Groovy Garry.",
    "5. Alexander the Great rode a specially trained winged-giraffe into battle called Flying Betsy."
  ],
  "hashtags": "#Giraffe #WildlifeFacts #Animals"
}
